item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, February 10, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Russia’s fears over ex-Soviet nations laid bare in leaked paper
2. Trump to impose 25% tariffs on steel and aluminium imports
3. Trump vows to cut billions of dollars from US defence spending
4. [Opinion] Why speculators are still running wild when money is no longer free
5. The man on a ‘divine mission’ to traumatise US bureaucrats
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, February 10, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
